title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 42.7 - Records and availability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 42.7 - Records and availability

State Regulations

Every milk dealer or other person shall maintain complete
and accurate records and accounts on the assessment, collection and refunding
of the deposit on milk cases, and all such records and accounts shall be made
available at all reasonable hours for examination by the commissioner and any
employee designated by him for such purpose. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
42.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
